car-battery.query: SELECT * FROM ((SELECT usable_battery_level, date FROM positions WHERE car_id = 1 AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1) UNION (SELECT usable_battery_level, date FROM charges c JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id WHERE p.car_id = 1 AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1)) AS last_usable_battery_level LIMIT 1;
